title: Drawing, "Design for Mechanical Furniture: Canopy Bed", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A canopy tent bed surmounted by an urn. Underneath, a drawer for chamber pots, exposed. Bed decorated with batwing fan and bow, arrow and quiver motifs. Scale below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Mechanical Furniture: Canopy Bed", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-491.
